accuracy.description: The correctness and precision of the provided solution based on the real-world information.

completeness.description: The degree to which the solution addresses all parts of the task and question.

relevance.description: The appropriateness of the solution to the specific question posed.

timeliness.description: The efficiency of the agent system in providing a solution within a reasonable time frame.

traceability.description: The ability to follow the reasoning process of the agent steps leading to the solution.

resource_utilization.description: The effectiveness of the system in using resources (like web searches) to obtain the solution.

adaptability.description: The system's ability to handle a diversity of tasks and its flexibility in problem-solving.

originality.description: The uniqueness of the solution provided, especially in the context of data not available in plain text from the internet.

clarity.description: How understandable and clear the solution is presented.
